source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
PrjCode,      
PrjName,      
U_Owner       ,
U_OwnerMail,  
U_Secondary,  
U_SecMail     ,
U_PORFApp     ,
U_PorfApp2,
U_PORF

from oprj
where Locked='N' and active = 'Y'


select 
PrjCode,      
PrjName,      
U_Owner       ,
U_OwnerMail,  
U_Secondary,  
U_SecMail     ,
U_PORFApp     ,
U_PorfApp2,
U_PORF

from oprj
where Locked='N' and active = 'Y'

SELECT 
	T0.[CardCode], 
	Isnull(t0.CardFName, CardName) AS [CardName], 
	CASE 
		WHEN T0.[GroupCode] = 101 THEN 'Local'
		WHEN T0.[GroupCode] = 102 THEN 'Abroad'
	END AS [Group],
	T2.[CurrName], 
	T0.E_Mail,  
	'' AS [PayMethod], 
	--U_ASLType, 
	t0.ListNum , 
	t0.LicTradNum, 
	DB_NAME() AS [DB_NAME]
 FROM [dbo].[OCRD] AS T0 
 
 LEFT JOIN [dbo].[OCRN] AS T2 
 ON T0.Currency = T2.CurrCode
 
 LEFT JOIN [dbo].[OCTG] AS T3 
 ON T0.GroupNum = T3.GroupNum

 WHERE [CardType] = 'S' 
   AND [frozenFor] = 'N'
   AND [GroupCode] IN (101,102)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT A.[DocEntry]
      ,A.[TaxId0]
      ,A.[TaxId1]
      ,A.[TaxId2]
      ,A.[TaxId3]
      ,A.[TaxId4]
      ,A.[TaxId5]
      ,A.[TaxId6]
      ,A.[TaxId7]
      ,A.[TaxId8]
      ,A.[TaxId9]
      ,A.[State]
      ,A.[County]
      ,A.[Incoterms]
      ,A.[Vehicle]
      ,A.[VidState]
      ,A.[NfRef]
      ,A.[Carrier]
      ,A.[QoP]
      ,A.[PackDesc]
      ,A.[Brand]
      ,A.[NoSU]
      ,A.[NetWeight]
      ,A.[GrsWeight]
      ,A.[LogInstanc]
      ,A.[ObjectType]
      ,A.[TaxId10]
      ,A.[TransCat]
      ,A.[FormNo]
      ,A.[TaxId11]
      ,A.[StreetS]
      ,A.[BlockS]
      ,A.[BuildingS]
      ,A.[CityS]
      ,A.[ZipCodeS]
      ,A.[CountyS]
      ,A.[StateS]
      ,A.[CountryS]
      ,A.[AddrTypeS]
      ,A.[StreetNoS]
      ,A.[StreetB]
      ,A.[BlockB]
      ,A.[BuildingB]
      ,A.[CityB]
      ,A.[ZipCodeB]
      ,A.[CountyB]
      ,A.[StateB]
      ,A.[CountryB]
      ,A.[AddrTypeB]
      ,A.[StreetNoB]
      ,A.[ImpORExp]
      ,A.[Vat]
      ,A.[AltCrdNamB]
      ,A.[AltTaxIdB]
      ,A.[Address2S]
      ,A.[Address3S]
      ,A.[Address2B]
      ,A.[Address3B]
      ,A.[MainUsage]
      ,A.[GlbLocNumS]
      ,A.[GlbLocNumB]
      ,A.[CollectDT]
      ,A.[TransprtDT]
      ,A.[TransprtRS]
      ,A.[TaxId12]
      ,A.[TaxId13]
  FROM [dbo].[RDR12] A
JOIN [dbo].[ORDR] B
ON A.[DocEntry] = B.[DocEntry]

WHERE B.UpdateDate >= '@{activity('get watermark').output.firstRow.highValue}'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT A.[DocEntry]
      ,A.[LineNum]
      ,A.[TargetType]
      ,A.[TrgetEntry]
      ,A.[BaseRef]
      ,A.[BaseType]
      ,A.[BaseEntry]
      ,A.[BaseLine]
      ,A.[LineStatus]
      ,A.[ItemCode]
      ,A.[Dscription]
      ,A.[Quantity]
      ,A.[ShipDate]
      ,A.[OpenQty]
      ,A.[Price]
      ,A.[Currency]
      ,A.[Rate]
      ,A.[DiscPrcnt]
      ,A.[LineTotal]
      ,A.[TotalFrgn]
      ,A.[OpenSum]
      ,A.[OpenSumFC]
      ,A.[VendorNum]
      ,A.[SerialNum]
      ,A.[WhsCode]
      ,A.[SlpCode]
      ,A.[AcctCode]
      ,A.[PriceBefDi]
      ,A.[DocDate]
      ,A.[Flags]
      ,A.[OpenCreQty]
      ,A.[TotalSumSy]
      ,A.[OpenSumSys]
      ,A.[InvntSttus]
      ,A.[OcrCode]
      ,A.[Project]
      ,A.[VatPrcnt]
      ,A.[PackQty]
      ,A.[BaseDocNum]
      ,A.[QtyToShip]
      ,A.[DelivrdQty]
      ,A.[OrderedQty]
      ,A.[ActDelDate]
      ,A.[OcrCode2]
      ,A.[LocCode]  
      ,A.[U_ReqDate]
      ,A.[TreeType]

FROM [dbo].[RDR1] A
JOIN [dbo].[ORDR] B
ON A.[DocEntry] = B.[DocEntry]

WHERE B.UpdateDate >= '@{activity('get watermark').output.firstRow.highValue}'
